## Native cursors

<div
  style={{
    display: 'grid',
    gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(200px, 1fr))',
    gap: '10px',
    fontFamily: 'monospace',
    fontSize: '0.8rem',
    textAlign: 'center',
  }}
>
  <div
    style={{
      cursor: 'none',
      padding: '5%',
      border: '1px solid',
      borderRadius: '0.2rem',
    }}
  >
    none
  </div>

      padding: '5%',
      border: '1px solid',
      borderRadius: '0.2rem',
    }}
  >
    grabbing
  </div>
</div>

```css
/* URL, with a keyword fallback */
cursor: url(hand.cur), pointer;

/* URL and coordinates, with a keyword fallback */
cursor: url(cursor1.png) 4 12, auto;
cursor: url(cursor2.png) 2 2, pointer;
```

## Massive cursor

For everything

```css
body {
  cursor: url(data:image/png;base64,),
    auto;
}
```

or only on links

```css
a {
  cursor: url(data:image/png;base64,),
    auto !important;
}
```
